mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT_REGISTRATION( report_registration_id, complaint_main_id, report_emp, patient_mobile, patient_relation, report_time, registration_emp, registration_time, dispute_time, is_major, summary_of_disputes, focus, patient_ask, next_link, next_link_man, create_by, create_date, update_date, del_flag, doctor_mobile, policy_number ) VALUES ( #{reportRegistrationId}, #{complaintMainId}, #{reportEmp}, #{patientMobile}, #{patientRelation}, #{reportTime}, #{registrationEmp}, #{registrationTime}, #{disputeTime}, #{isMajor}, #{summaryOfDisputes}, #{focus}, #{patientAsk}, #{nextLink}, #{nextLinkMan}, #{createUser}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, 0, #{doctorMobile}, #{policyNumber} )
mapper.select: SELECT act_hi_actinst.task_id_ AS taskId,act_hi_actinst.proc_inst_id_ AS procInsId FROM complaint_main LEFT JOIN act_hi_actinst ON act_hi_actinst.proc_inst_id_ = complaint_main.proc_ins_id WHERE complaint_main.complaint_main_id=#{complaintMainId} AND act_hi_actinst.ACT_TYPE_='userTask' ORDER BY act_hi_actinst.start_time_ DESC LIMIT 1
